title: Don't label me
creator_credit: Douglas Leiterman, Richard Ballentine and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Examines the subject of neutralism, or non-alignment, as preached and practised by Dr. Cheddi Jagan, Prime Minister of the former colony of British Guiana, now emerging from colonization, who admires Castro, but also pleads, “Don’t try to pin any labels on me!”
creator_credit_for_label: Douglas Leiterman, Richard Ballentine and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
